Islands and coastlands praise (applied broadly by some teachers).
The earth is the LORD’s, and everything in it.
The earth filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD.
The LORD reigns; let the earth rejoice.
Your salvation among all nations; let the peoples praise You.
A light to the nations, to the ends of the earth.
All the ends of the world shall remember and turn to the LORD.
